content.question: ​The graph of which of the following functions in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane has at least one <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-intercept, at least one hole, at least one vertical asymptote, and a horizontal asymptote?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 16 over denominator x squared minus x minus 6 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>16</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 16 over denominator x squared minus x minus 30 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>16</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 4 over denominator x squared minus x minus 30 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>30</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 4 over denominator x squared minus x minus 6 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x squared minus 4 over denominator x squared minus x minus 6 end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
